content:
Take a moment to think of the kids in cages.

Every day.

These are real illustrations migrant children drew depicting their time in U.S. detention camps. 


#NoKidsInCages #FreeTheChildren #Art #socialart #refugees #safethechildrenpic.twitter.com/4pKvSovLji

"If it was your son
you would fill the sea
with ships all by the millions
acting as a bridge
to get it through.

But don't worry,
He's just a child of lost humanity,
of dirty humanity, 
which makes no noise.
He is not your son.
Sleep peacefully,
it's not yours"
#Refugees pic.twitter.com/GpjgS5bEmG
